title: Harmony Afterwork
subtitle: Après-ski edition
description: Harmony, an afterwork in Antwerp's cosiest neighbourhood. This edition takes place @ De Koninck! Come along and enjoy some drinks, food & music.

title: Wild Jo's market
subtitle: Craft. art. food. drinks. live music. design & more
description: Wild Jo's Market is hosted at WINTAR on 8 february, a unique setting in Antwerp that offers an Indoor & Outdoor area.

title: SILENT DISCO
subtitle: Ssssst… hier rijpt ons Bolleke.
description: Put on your headphones and dance the night away at De Koninck's Silent Disco! Choose your channel, move to your favorite beats, and enjoy our Bolleke in a unique silent party atmosphere. The only sound you'll hear is the music in your ears and the laughter around you.

title: Brewery Tour & Tasting
subtitle: Discover the art of brewing
description: Join us for an exclusive brewery tour at De Koninck. Learn about our brewing process and enjoy a guided tasting of our finest beers.

title: Jazz Night
subtitle: Live music & craft beer
description: Experience an evening of smooth jazz melodies paired with our signature Bolleke. Live performances in the heart of Antwerp.

title: Spring Market
subtitle: Local vendors & food trucks
description: Celebrate spring at De Koninck with local artisans, food vendors, and live entertainment. A perfect Sunday afternoon in Antwerp.

title: Harmony Afterwork
subtitle: Spring edition
description: Harmony, an afterwork in Antwerp's cosiest neighbourhood. This spring edition takes place @ De Koninck! Come along and enjoy some drinks, food & music.

title: Beer & Food Pairing
subtitle: Culinary experience
description: Join our expert brewers and chefs for an exclusive beer and food pairing evening. Discover how our beers complement different flavors.
